summary: Global food security is an urgent problem, exacerbated by the COVID-19 pandemic. Feed the Future, a U.S. government global food security initiative led by the U.S. Agency for International Development, aims to reduce global hunger, malnutrition, and poverty. USAID and its 11 federal partner agencies collect data to monitor how Feed the Future is working. But they don't have performance goals to analyze how the...
title: Global Food Security: Improved Monitoring Framework Needed to Assess and Report on Feed the Future's Performance
